alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:50AM MST until January 06 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on area roads including during the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
